properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 12 at 8:35AM CST until January 16 at 11:34AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood
Advisory for the Right Hand Chute Little River...

Right Hand Chute Little River at Rivervale affecting Mississippi
and Poinsett Counties

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
the Right Hand Chute Little River at Rivervale
* from Sunday January 12 until Thursday January 16.
* At 08 AM Sunday the stage was 7.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 11.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will rise to near 9.4 feet Thursday January
16.
* At 10.0 feet...Unprotected farm land near the river is flooded
between Rivervale and Big Lake Wildlife Refuge.
properties.instruction:
The next River Statement will be issued Monday morning or sooner if conditions
warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
